trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs"></xref> class using the provided <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs"></xref>類別使用提供<> *> 和<> *>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The `item` and `commandSource` parameters initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> properties with their respective values.
trans-unit.target: `item`和`commandSource`參數初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>具有各自的值的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs"></xref> class using the given <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>, and the original command arguments.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs"></xref>類別使用給定<> *>， <> </> *>，和原始命令引數。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This constructor builds a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式建置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The `item` and `commandSource` parameters initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> properties with their respective values.
trans-unit.target: `item`和`commandSource`參數初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>具有各自的值的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor includes an `originalArgs` parameter; this form of the constructor allows you to pass in a set of command arguments through the `originalArgs` parameter, which is useful for handling bubbled events.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式包括`originalArgs`參數; 此表單的建構函式可讓您將透過命令列引數的一組`originalArgs`參數，可用於處理事件反昇。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource*>

trans-unit.source: The original arguments inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 原始的引數繼承自<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 傳回引發事件的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the name of the default command.
trans-unit.target: 設定或傳回的預設命令的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: When set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> attempts to render a shortcut to invoke the default command.
trans-unit.target: 設定時，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>嘗試呈現叫用的預設命令的捷徑。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the default rendering in `ListView` displays the first field as a link to the `DetailsView` of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，預設在轉譯`ListView`的連結以顯示第一個欄位`DetailsView`的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property, clicking the link invokes the default command.
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>屬性中，按一下連結會叫用的預設命令。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Invoking the default command raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 叫用的預設命令引發<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs> object is set to the value of the DefaultCommand property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>物件設定為 DefaultCommand 屬性的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even if a default command is defined, you should include a command with the same name in the commands collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使定義預設的命令，您應該具有相同名稱的命令集合中包含的命令。

trans-unit.source: If the control cannot render a graphical element that includes a shortcut for the default command, the default command is still available by rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 控制項無法呈現圖形元素包含預設命令的捷徑的預設命令是否仍然可用轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list item that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 傳回清單項目產生事件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The list item that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 產生事件的清單項目。
